Subroutine vom_adapt_roots

1642 : 
1643 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1644 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1645 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1646 : !*------ADJUSTMENT OF ROOT SURFACE--------------------------------------
1647 : 
1648 :       subroutine vom_adapt_roots ()
1649 :       use vegmod
1650 :       use vegwatmod
1651 :       use watmod
1652 :       implicit none
1653 : 
1654 : 
1655 : !*-----PERENNIAL VEGETATION---------------
1656 :       reff(:) = 0.d0
1657 :       if (md_ .gt. 0.d0) then   !if md_=0, then changef is calculated elsewhere
1658 :         changef = (0.95d0 * mqx_ - mqssmin) / (0.05d0 * mqx_)  ! (3.47)
1659 :       else 
1660 :         !     * changef for md_=0 is either 0 or 1. Change it to be either -1 or + 1:
1661 :         changef = 2.d0*changef - 1.d0
1662 :       endif
1663 :       reff(1:pos_) = 0.5d0 * ruptkvec_d(1:pos_) / rsurfvec(1:pos_)     &
1664 :      &             / (MAXVAL(ruptkvec_d(1:pos_) / rsurfvec(1:pos_)))  ! (3.48)
1665 :       where (ruptkvec_d(1:pos_) .lt. 0.d0)
1666 :         reff(:) = 0.d0
1667 :       end where
1668 :       if (changef .lt. 0.d0) then
1669 :         reff(:) = 1.d0 - reff(:)
1670 :       endif
1671 : !     * rsurf=(2*epsln_/rootrad) if all pores filled by roots   
1672 :       rsurfnewvec(1:pos_) = MIN(2.d0 * epsln_ / rootrad * delzvec(1:pos_),    &
1673 :      &                 MAX(rsurfmin * delzvec(1:pos_), rsurfvec(1:pos_)       &
1674 :      &                 + rsurfvec(1:pos_) * growthmax * changef               &
1675 :      &                 * reff(1:pos_) * delzvec(1:pos_)))
1676 :      
1677 : !*-----SEASONAL VEGETATION---------------
1678 : !     * rootlim is either 0 or 1. Change it to be either -1 or + 1:
1679 :       rootlim(pos2(1), pos2(2)) = 2.d0*rootlim(pos2(1), pos2(2)) - 1.d0
1680 :       reffg(:) = 0.d0
1681 :       reffg(1:posg) = 0.5d0 * ruptkg_d(1:posg) / rsurfg_(1:posg)     &
1682 :      &             / (MAXVAL(ruptkg_d(1:posg) / rsurfg_(1:posg)))  ! (3.48)
1683 : !     * if roots are going to be reduced, reverse effectivity vector     
1684 :       if (rootlim(pos2(1), pos2(2)).lt.0.d0) then
1685 :         reffg(:) = 1.d0 - reffg(:)
1686 :       endif
1687 : !     * maximum rsurfg depends on rsurf of trees in same layer.
1688 :       rsurfgnew(1:posg) = MIN(2.d0 * epsln_ / rootrad * delzvec(1:posg) &
1689 :      &                  - rsurfvec(1:posg), MAX(rsurfmin                &
1690 :      &                  * delzvec(1:posg), rsurfg_(1:posg)              &
1691 :      &                  + rsurfg_(1:posg) * growthmax * rootlim(pos2(1),&
1692 :      &                   pos2(2)) * reffg(1:posg)))
1693 :       rsurfgnew(posg+1:M___) = 0.d0
1694 :       rootlim(:,:)           = 0.d0
1695 :       ruptkvec_d(:)          = 0.d0
1696 :       changef = 0.d0
1697 : 
1698 :       return
1699 :       end subroutine vom_adapt_roots
